name: Gunpowder Tea (Demo for Game Boy)
description:
Controls (Being compared to a Game Boy:)

Z - A Button

X - B Button

Arrows - D-Pad

Enter - Start Button

Shift - Select Button (Item Menu to use outside of battle, if you made tea.)

Hey! I'm Joseph Fisher-Schramm.

I'm a musician mostly, sometimes author. I learned of the free software GB Studio, made by Chris Maltby, and started messing with it.  My idea for this game grew pretty quickly, but out of feasible means for this software. This demo serves as the introduction for the upcoming complete game, for modern  software (A Study in Expression is a record label/art collective, a division of which is working on this game!) None of us have ever made a game, but I have great expectations.

If you like this project and want to support it, you can support A Study in Expression or me personally - that means music, merch, showing your friends, etc.

Thanks for your time!
